entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Get Exception returns all DB context entries, which cause huge log file. and vulnerable to add modified, added data #27646
  • Save SQLite file to MyDocuments #27580
  • `ef migrations script --idempotent` generates broken script #27645
  • NU1202 Package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore 6.0.3 is not compatible with netstandard2.1 #27636
  • Provide API for returning Func<TEntity, bool> predicated based on keys #27623
  • QueryTrackingBehavior.NoTracking has different behavior in 'Debug' and 'Release' mode #27567
  • Why do I fail to duplicate AdventureWorks2019 with scaffolding followed by migration? #27644

Updated

  • Add support for managing Triggers with EF migration #10770
    Backlog
  • More streamlined workflow for early stage app development #3053
    7.0.0
  • navagation with keyed entity type mapped to sql query not supported? #27629
  • Loading derived entity #27633
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The connection was not closed. The connection's current state is connecting #27602
  • Proper way to seed test data in EF Core 6.0.2 #27599
  • Add EntityFrameworkQueryableExtensions.ToLookupAsync #26867
    Backlog
  • IReadOnlyCollection<string> throws an exception with CosmosDB #27643
  • Add API to apply hierarchy mapping strategy for the whole model #27642
    Backlog
  • Clean up SaveChanges/batching tests #27640
    MQ
  • Reverse-engineer composite keys to PrimaryKeyAttribute when using data annotations #27637
    7.0.0
  • Delta Lake Provider #27632
  • After upgrading from EF 6.0.1 to EF 6.0.2: broken query generation when using aggregate #27621
  • Add-Migration fails with "An item with the same key has already been added" when renaming entity #27504
    7.0.0
  • Using PK with HasColumnType causes strange migrations for Owned Types #27619
    7.0.0
  • Bug: dotnet-ef --output-dir ignored for ApplicationDbContextModelSnapshot and placing in default folder #27631
  • Implement bulk deletion #27550
  • Plan for Entity Framework Core 7.0 #26994
    Discussions
  • Migration for updated seed data does not set all enum values converted to string correctly #27575
    7.0.0
  • Allow temporal Period properties to be mapped to CLR properties (i.e. not shadow properties) #26463
    7.0.0
  • Relational: TPC inheritance mapping pattern #3170
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Scaffolding: Use "CodeTemplates" directory #27626
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.25.0 to 3.26.0 #27641
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add metadata support for TPC #27628

Updated

  • Improve SQL Server insertion logic and other update pipeline optimizations #27573
  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 2 #27447
    auto-merge
  • Refactor ReaderModificationCommandBatch #27584
